title: Process a Request for Information (ROI)
description: An HIM specialist needs to process a signed request from a patient for a copy of their medical records.

tasks.description: Verify the patient's signature on the ROI form and confirm their identity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the request is valid and properly authorized.

tasks.description: Define the date range and types of records requested (e.g., lab results, progress notes).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the specific records to be released.

tasks.description: Generate a PDF of the requested records and release it to the patient via the secure patient portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully compiles and sends the requested medical records.
